name: Saved by His Noodly Light
description: Spend five consecutive seconds running on the endless abyss of space, supported only by the Flying Spaghetti Monster's holy light. To prove your trust in Him, do this eight times in a single Infinite Mode run.

name: Widdershins
description: As the Lizard, run 1000m in Infinite Mode without ever moving left.

name: Electrophobia
description: In Infinite Mode, run 512m with a single character without touching a single power cell. (Earning achievements is fine.)

name: Little Ramps
description: Beat this level without pressing jump.

name: Violation of Common Sense
description: Avoid the regular tiles in the first half of this level.

name: Angled Surface Enthusiast
description: Touch a box, a ramp, and then another box.

name: Light Is Not Good
description: Avoid ice tiles.

name: Dark Is Not Evil
description: Only touch dark tiles.

name: Snakes and Ladders
description: Don't jump.

name: Wrecking Ball
description: Break everything!

name: Dizzy
description: Go around the tunnel twice.

name: In a Hurry
description: Don't let the conveyors slow you down!

name: Right Back Into the Air
description: Jump from ramp to ramp.

name: Precise Jumper
description: Land in the middle of each platform.

name: A Destructive Loop
description: Go around the tunnel, and dislodge 90 crumbling tiles.

name: I'm Not Blue (Da Ba Dee)
description: Only touch the ice.

name: Rickety Scaffolding
description: Go around the tunnel without dislodging any tiles.

name: Surgical
description: Dislodge exactly 25 tiles.

name: Good Eye
description: Avoid the slow conveyors and walk on the fast ones.

name: Variety Pack
description: Touch each type of tile at least once.

name: What's Inside?
description: Jump from box to box. (You can touch the first few tiles.)

name: I Found the Pattern!
description: Only touch dark tiles.

name: Duplicator's Lucky Number
description: Dislodge exactly 7 tiles.

name: Watch Your Antennae!
description: Dislodge the tiles without rotating the tunnel.

name: Falling Grey Objects Ahead
description: Win using one jump or less.

name: Painstaking
description: Stay on the conveyor. No jumping. Just tough it out on the slow conveyor until the end.

name: Hasty
description: Win in only one jump. Full speed ahead!

name: Stepping Stone Stepper
description: Go around the tunnel one and a half times.

name: Across the Frozen Pond
description: Don't touch the ice!

name: Annihilation
description: Destroy this level. Leave nothing behind.

name: Fastpass
description: Only touch the conveyors.

name: I Hate Ups and Downs
description: Ramps go up, and crumbling tiles fall. Avoid at all costs.

name: Buried Boxes Ahead
description: Jump three times or less, and don't touch boxes.

name: Spiral Staircase
description: Don't jump!

name: Coursing Through
description: Don't slow down, and don't leave the ground.
